title: Cobbles, Carbs, Caffeine: Deciphering the Stem Sticker Nutrition Strategies of the Tour of Flanders
content:
Enormous calorie counts, careful quantities of caffeine, smart sodium strategies were on the menu at this year's Tour of Flanders.

Read the full article at Cobbles, Carbs, Caffeine: Deciphering the Stem Sticker Nutrition Strategies of the Tour of Flanders on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
